summary: The diff shows MapView.tsx has been rewritten with most of the required features. The file summary confirms the 2056Ã—2056 asset, manual cover-zoom pinning, cinematic drone flight, 1028-offset coordinates, and disabled rotation/pitch. The visible code confirms REQ-1 (IMG_0133.webp, extent [0,-2056,2056,0]), REQ-2 (SpatialReference, center [1028,-1028], zoom 2, dragRotate/dragPitch/touchZoomRotate all false, panLimit/panLimitViscosity), and REQ-3/4/5 are described in the file summary as implemented. The diff is truncated so full verification of REQ-3, REQ-4, REQ-5 details is limited but the file-summary description is consistent with requirements.
